thread.title: GAO: Federal Networks Remain Vulnerable To Cyberattacks After OPM Hack

title: GAO: Federal Networks Remain Vulnerable To Cyberattacks After OPM Hack
text:
05 GAO: Federal Networks Remain Vulnerable To Cyberattacks After OPM Hack 
Homeland Security Today: Although each day seems to bring news of another damaging cyber attack, federal agencies continue to lag behind in implementing crucial information security policies and practices, creating significant cybersecurity weaknesses within the agencies, according to a recent Government Accountability Office (GAO) audit report.
